mapper.sql: delivery_details_id AS "deliveryDetailsId", item_id AS "itemId", customer_id AS "customerId", adress_id AS "adressId", contacts_id AS "contactsId", phone_id AS "phoneId", stock_item_id AS "stockItemId", delivery_id AS "deliveryId", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_delivery_details where 1 = 1
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and adress_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.adressId},'%')
and contacts_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.contactsId},'%')
and phone_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.phoneId},'%')
and stock_item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.stockItemId},'%')
and delivery_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deliveryId},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_delivery_details where 1 = 1
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and adress_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.adressId},'%')
and contacts_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.contactsId},'%')
and phone_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.phoneId},'%')
and stock_item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.stockItemId},'%')
and delivery_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deliveryId},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_delivery_details where 1 = 1
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and adress_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.adressId},'%')
and contacts_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.contactsId},'%')
and phone_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.phoneId},'%')
and stock_item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.stockItemId},'%')
and delivery_id = #{paramCondition.deliveryId}

select
from daoxin_erp_delivery_details where 1 = 1
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and adress_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.adressId},'%')
and contacts_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.contactsId},'%')
and phone_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.phoneId},'%')
and stock_item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.stockItemId},'%')
and delivery_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deliveryId},'%')
